content: knitted vest for men in drops karisma the piece is worked top down with round neck and ribbed edges see 219-2 georgetown hat 1 pattern here drops design pattern no u-898 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 57 olive **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/219-2-georgetown-hat
